Address.label: Address
Address.value: 601 GATEWAY BOULEVARD SUITE 350, SOUTH SAN FRANCISCO, California, 94080, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Akero Therapeutics Inc is a clinical-stage biotechnology company focused on developing and commercializing transformative treatments for serious metabolic diseases with high unmet medical needs. Its focus is nonalcoholic steatohepatitis, or NASH, a disease without any approved therapies. The company's product candidate efruxifermin is an FGF21 analog with properties that has the potential to address the core processes underlying NASH pathogenesis.

value.name: Jonathan Young
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
